name: Hess Connect
tag_list: internet-marketing, seo, search-engine-optimization, google-penalty-recovery, search-engine-marketing, wordpress, website-design, website-development, web-promotion, wordpress-website-design, wordpress-consulting, social-media, social-media-management, le
overview:
Founded by Viveca Hess, Hess Connect Marketing is a boutique Internet Marketing company based in San Diego. Hess Connect Marketing serves small businesses through large-market clients within California and throughout the continental United States.

Hess Connect specializes in catering to the needs of Regulated Industries including: Legal, Insurance, Financial and Medical. Our Founder’s 15+ year marketing law background enables Hess Connect to be uniquely qualified to serve these regulated industries while minimizing risk and maximizing results.

The firm provides WordPress Website Design, Organic Search Engine Optimization (SEO) , and Social Media Management to companies who wish to outsource their internet marketing activities. Additional services such as site optimization, google penalty recovery, graphic design, brand identity and logo creation or rebranding, copy creation, blog set up, email campaign management, and press release creation and distribution are also available.

external_links.title: Hess Connect Launches New Website with Expanded Internet Marketing Services
